CustomField.formula: IF ( OR( AND (ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Author Contract")), AND (ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Submitted Request")), AND( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"Request"), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Request"),ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"In Amendment"),ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"In Renewal"),ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"")) ) ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalContextSubmit?sObjectType=Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c&sObjectId="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_SubmitRequest", "Submit Request"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Submit TE for Approval
